title: Send a Demo
description: Send a demo is an app made for recording and uploading audio to share with your friends. I worked with a friend over the course of a couple months adding various features, fixing bugs, and collaborating regularly.
tools: Built with React, CSS, HTML, Node.js, Express, MongoDB
